name: Spicy Spaghetti
description: Indulge in the fiery flavors of this mouth-watering, spicy spaghetti dish.
instructions: 1. Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
2. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add minced garlic and saut√© until fragrant.
3. Add finely chopped onions, red bell pepper, and green chili pepper. Cook until they begin to soften.
4. Add sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture and start to brown.
5. Add meatballs and cook until browned and cooked through.
6. Stir in tomato sauce, basil, oregano, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 10-15 minutes, allowing the flavors to meld.
7. Serve the spicy meatball and vegetable sauce over the cooked spaghetti.
